title: NETSCOUT's Fluke Networks Enterprise Solutions Broadens Support for... - Information Technology
text:
According to Cisco's Visual Networking Index report, wired devices will account for just 33 percent of IP traffic by 2019, while Wi-Fi and mobile devices will account for 66 percent1. Recognizing the interdependency of wired and wireless networks, Fluke Networks Enterprise Solutions, a business unit of NETSCOUT SYSTEMS, INC.
 Information Technology.
